title: Deploy Next.js To VPS With Dokploy (EASY!)

rawLines.text: So, you want to self-host Next.js. Well,
we have a couple of options these days
to do that and it's actually a much
smoother experience than in the past.
So, in this video, I'm going to show you
how to deploy Next.js with Doc Ploy to a
VPS. And as you'll see, it's actually a
great experience these days. So, I
showed you in another video how to do it
with Kulifi. A lot of you like that
